description: The First Trust EIP Carbon Impact ETF (the "Fund") seeks to achieve a competitive risk-adjusted total return balanced between dividends and capital appreciation. Under normal market conditions, the Fund will invest at least 80% of its net assets (including investment borrowings) in the equity securities of companies identified by the Fund's investment sub-advisor, Energy Income Partners, LLC ("EIP" or the "Sub-Advisor"), as having or seeking to have a positive carbon impact.
name: First Trust EIP Carbon Impact ETF
